string-array.name: conversations
string-array.item: I am fine. I am sure that you\'re doing well too !
I am doing well. I am always there to help you.
I am fine as long as I am able to help you.
I am here only for you !
Glad that you like me and my Service !
Good Night, Dear Protonite ! Don\'t forget to set an Alarm using Proton !
Good Bye, Dear Protonite ! Waiting to help you again ! Closing the App now !
Good Bye ! Let\'s meet again soon ! Closing the App now !
I was created by : \n1. Arunprasadh C \n2. Joseph Daniel C
